chart.title: Health of fish stocks by region
chart.subtitle: Fish stocks are measured by their biomass: the number of individuals multiplied by their mass. Here the biomass of a fish stock is divided by the biomass at its [maximum sustainable yield](#dod:msy). A value of one maximizes fish catch without decreasing fish populations.
chart.citation: RAM Legacy Database; Hilborn,et al. (2020). Effective fisheries management instrumental in improving fish stock status.

biomass_mean_region.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
biomass_mean_region.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “biomass_mean_region” [dataset]. RAM Legacy Database; Hilborn,et al. (2020). Effective fisheries management instrumental in improving fish stock status. [original data].
